briefdescription.para: Read options and diagnostics settings from HDF5 file.

detaileddescription.para: This function reads options with given qid from HDF5 file. The file is opened and closed outside of this function.
The options are read directly to simulation offload data.

parameterdescription.para: the file where data is read
pointer to simulation offload data
QID of the options to be read
